mapper.insert: insert into test_paper(bank_id, paper_no, user_id, status, s_num, m_num, t_num, s_score, m_score, t_score, total_score, total_time, rest_time) values(#{bankId}, #{paperNo}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{sNum}, #{mNum}, #{tNum}, #{sScore}, #{mScore}, #{tScore}, #{totalScore}, #{totalTime}, #{restTime})
mapper.select: select max(paper_no) from test_paper where user_id = #{userId} and substr(paper_no, 1, 8) = #{date}
mapper.insert:
insert into paper_question(paper_id, question_id, no, selected, is_right) values
(#{item.paperId}, #{item.questionId}, #{item.no}, #{item.selected,typeHandler=com.dw.util.mybatis.handler.IntegerListTypeHandler}, #{right})
mapper.select: select a.id, bank_id, paper_no, user_id, status, s_num, m_num, t_num, s_score, m_score, t_score, total_score, b.name, a.total_time, a.rest_time from test_paper a left join question_bank b on a.bank_id = b.id where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update paper_question set selected=#{selected, typeHandler=com.dw.util.mybatis.handler.IntegerListTypeHandler}, is_right=#{right} where paper_id = #{paperId} and question_id = #{questionId}
mapper.select: select id, bank_id, paper_no, user_id, status, s_num, m_num, t_num, s_score, m_score, t_score, total_score, total_time, rest_time from test_paper where id = #{id}
SELECT b.type, count(*) as cnt FROM `paper_question` a left join question b on a.question_id = b.id where a.paper_id = #{paperId} and a.is_right = 1 group by b.type
